# styles

Directory containing global stylesheets for the website, managing theme system, typography, and motion preferences.

## Contents

[global.css](./global.css) â€” Global stylesheet configuring theme system with light/dark OS preference detection, Inter font (400-700 weights), IBM Plex Mono for code blocks, smooth scroll behavior, theme toggle button styling with hover/active states, and reduced motion accessibility support.

## Architecture

Single stylesheet loaded by layout components to provide:

- CSS custom properties via `:root` for theme tokens
- Base styles on `body`, `html` elements
- Component-level styles for theme toggle buttons
- Media queries for accessibility (prefers-reduced-motion)

## Behavioral Contracts

### Root Variables

```text
color-scheme: light dark
```

### Theme Transition Durations

```text
html color-scheme transition: 0.2s ease
body background-color, color transition: 0.3s ease
all elements color, background-color, border-color transition: 0.3s ease
```

### Theme Toggle Button

- Hover: `translateY(-1px)` with `0 4px 12px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1)` shadow
- Active: `translateY(0)`
- SVG transition: 0.3s ease

### Reduced Motion

```css
@media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
  * {
    transition: none !important;
  }
}
```

### Font Stacks

- Primary: Inter (Google Fonts, weights 400-700)
- Monospace: IBM Plex Mono, SFMono-Regular, system monospace
